PSXDataSelector.nativeStatement: SELECT DISTINCT CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTID, CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTTYPEID FROM CONTENTSTATUS, STATES, STATEROLES, ROLES WHERE CONTENTSTATUS.OBJECTTYPE = 1 AND CONTENTSTATUS.COMMUNITYID = :"PSXUserContext/user/sessionobject/sys_community" AND CONTENTSTATUS.WORKFLOWAPPID = STATEROLES.WORKFLOWAPPID AND CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTSTATEID = STATEROLES.STATEID AND CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTSTATEID = STATES.STATEID AND CONTENTSTATUS.WORKFLOWAPPID = STATES.WORKFLOWAPPID AND STATEROLES.SHOWININBOX = 'y' AND ROLES.ROLEID = STATEROLES.ROLEID AND ROLES.WORKFLOWAPPID = STATEROLES.WORKFLOWAPPID AND ( ROLES.ROLENAME IN (:"PSXParam/sys_userrolenames") OR EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM CONTENTADHOCUSERS WHERE CONTENTADHOCUSERS.USERNAME = ':"PSXUserContext/user/name"' AND CONTENTADHOCUSERS.CONTENTID = CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTID ) ) ORDER BY CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTID ASC

SELECT DISTINCT CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTID, CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTTYPEID, CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTLASTMODIFIEDDATE FROM CONTENTSTATUS CONTENTSTATUS, STATEROLES STATEROLES, ROLES ROLES WHERE CONTENTSTATUS.OBJECTTYPE = 1 AND CONTENTSTATUS.COMMUNITYID = :"PSXUserContext/user/sessionobject/sys_community" AND CONTENTSTATUS.WORKFLOWAPPID = STATEROLES.WORKFLOWAPPID AND CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTSTATEID = STATEROLES.STATEID AND ROLES.ROLEID = STATEROLES.ROLEID AND ROLES.WORKFLOWAPPID = STATEROLES.WORKFLOWAPPID AND (ROLES.ROLENAME IN (:"PSXParam/sys_userrolenames") OR EXISTS (SELECT * FROM CONTENTADHOCUSERS WHERE CONTENTADHOCUSERS.USERNAME = ':"PSXUserContext/user/name"' AND CONTENTADHOCUSERS.CONTENTID = CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTID)) AND CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTLASTMODIFIEDDATE >= {ts ':"PSXParam/sys_RecentDate"'} ORDER BY CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTLASTMODIFIEDDATE DESC

SELECT DISTINCT CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTID, CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTTYPEID, CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTLASTMODIFIEDDATE FROM CONTENTSTATUS CONTENTSTATUS, ROLES ROLES, STATEROLES STATEROLES WHERE CONTENTSTATUS.OBJECTTYPE = 1 AND CONTENTSTATUS.COMMUNITYID = :"PSXUserContext/user/sessionobject/sys_community" AND CONTENTSTATUS.WORKFLOWAPPID = STATEROLES.WORKFLOWAPPID AND CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTSTATEID = STATEROLES.STATEID AND ROLES.ROLEID = STATEROLES.ROLEID AND ROLES.WORKFLOWAPPID = STATEROLES.WORKFLOWAPPID AND (ROLES.ROLENAME IN (:"PSXParam/sys_userrolenames") OR EXISTS (SELECT * FROM CONTENTADHOCUSERS WHERE CONTENTADHOCUSERS.USERNAME = ':"PSXUserContext/user/name"' AND CONTENTADHOCUSERS.CONTENTID = CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTID)) AND CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTLASTMODIFIEDDATE >= {ts ':"PSXUserContext/SessionCreateTime"'} ORDER BY CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTLASTMODIFIEDDATE DESC

SELECT DISTINCT CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTID, CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTTYPEID, CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTLASTMODIFIEDDATE FROM CONTENTSTATUS CONTENTSTATUS, STATEROLES STATEROLES, ROLES ROLES WHERE CONTENTSTATUS.OBJECTTYPE = 1 AND CONTENTSTATUS.COMMUNITYID = :"PSXUserContext/user/sessionobject/sys_community" AND CONTENTSTATUS.WORKFLOWAPPID = STATEROLES.WORKFLOWAPPID AND CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTSTATEID = STATEROLES.STATEID AND ROLES.ROLEID = STATEROLES.ROLEID AND ROLES.WORKFLOWAPPID = STATEROLES.WORKFLOWAPPID AND (ROLES.ROLENAME IN (:"PSXParam/sys_userrolenames") OR EXISTS (SELECT * FROM CONTENTADHOCUSERS WHERE CONTENTADHOCUSERS.USERNAME = ':"PSXUserContext/user/name"' AND CONTENTADHOCUSERS.CONTENTID = CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTID)) AND CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTLASTMODIFIEDDATE >= {d ':"PSXParam/sys_RecentDate"'} ORDER BY CONTENTSTATUS.CONTENTLASTMODIFIEDDATE DESC
